basetheme_ctor_delimiter_start: // XXX BASETHEME CTOR AUTO-GENERATED CODE START
basetheme_ctor_delimiter_end: // XXX BASETHEME CTOR AUTO-GENERATED CODE END

containerAlignment.description: The alignment in {@link Container} for when there is extra space.

multiContainerSpacing.description: The spacing length between widgets in {@link MultiContainer}.

multiContainerAlignment.description: The alignment in {@link MultiContainer} for when there is unused space.

primaryFill.description: The primary {@link https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/CanvasRenderingContext2D/fillStyle | fill style}. Usually a saturated colour used for filling boxes that need to stand out.

accentFill.description: The accent {@link https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/CanvasRenderingContext2D/fillStyle | fill style}. Usually a saturated colour more saturated than {@link ThemeProperties#primaryFill} used for highlighting boxes which use PrimaryFill.

backgroundFill.description: The background {@link https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/CanvasRenderingContext2D/fillStyle | fill style}. Used for widgets with a background (as in, a background above the canvas background).

backgroundGlowFill.description: The background glow {@link https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/CanvasRenderingContext2D/fillStyle | fill style}. Used for highlighting boxes which use {@link ThemeProperties#backgroundFill}.

sliderMinLength.description: The minimum length of a {@link Slider}

bodyTextFont.description: The {@link https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/CanvasRenderingContext2D/font | font style} used for body text (most regular text).

bodyTextFill.description: The {@link https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/CanvasRenderingContext2D/fillStyle | fill style} used for body text (most regular text).

bodyTextHeight.description: The height of each line of text in body text (most regular text). If null, it will be automatically detected.

bodyTextSpacing.description: The spacing between each line of text in body text (most regular text). If null, it will be automatically detected.

bodyTextAlign.description: The default text alignment mode of body text (most regular text).

checkboxLength.description: The length in pixels used for {@link Checkbox}.

checkboxInnerPadding.description: The {@link Padding} used for {@link Checkbox} between the accent box shown when ticked and the background box.

inputBackgroundFill.description: The background {@link https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/CanvasRenderingContext2D/fillStyle | fill style} used for input widgets like {@link TextInput}.

inputSelectBackgroundFill.description: The background {@link https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/CanvasRenderingContext2D/fillStyle | fill style} used for input widgets like {@link TextInput} when text is selected.

inputTextFont.description: The {@link https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/CanvasRenderingContext2D/font | font style} used for text in input widgets like {@link TextInput}.

inputTextFill.description: The {@link https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/CanvasRenderingContext2D/fillStyle | fill style} used for text in input widgets like {@link TextInput}.

inputTextFillDisabled.description: The {@link https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/CanvasRenderingContext2D/fillStyle | fill style} used for text in input widgets like {@link TextInput} when disabled.

inputTextFillInvalid.description: The {@link https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/CanvasRenderingContext2D/fillStyle | fill style} used for text in input widgets like {@link TextInput} when invalid.

inputTextHeight.description: The height of each line of text in input widgets like {@link TextInput}. If null, it will be automatically detected.

inputTextSpacing.description: The spacing between each line of text in input widgets like {@link TextInput}. If null, it will be automatically detected.

inputTextInnerPadding.description: The {@link Padding} between text and border used for text input widgets like {@link TextInput}.

inputTextMinWidth.description: The default minimum width of text input widgets like {@link TextInput}.

inputTextAlign.description: The default text alignment mode of text input widgets like {@link TextInput}.

blinkRate.description: The blink rate of text cursors in text input widgets like {@link TextInput}. Value in "blinks" per second.

cursorThickness.description: The thickness of a text cursor in pixels.

scrollBarThickness.description: The thickness of a {@link ScrollableViewportWidget}'s scrollbar in pixels.

scrollBarMinPercent.description: The minimum length of the filled part of a {@link ScrollableViewportWidget}'s scrollbar in percentage of total length.

scrollBarMinPixels.description: The minimum length of the filled part of a {@link ScrollableViewportWidget}'s scrollbar in pixels.

radioButtonLength.description: Similar to {@link ThemeProperties#checkboxLength}, but for {@link RadioButton}.

radioButtonInnerPadding.description: Similar to {@link ThemeProperties#checkboxInnerPadding}, but for {@link RadioButton}.
